attributes.action: Ban the preaching of islamic law in Great britain or england.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Islamic people have already stated that we would never be allowed to preach in their countries unless we were preaching islamic law.
This has even been stated on television.
There has to be a fairness to our people, we should not allow them to build mosques in our country.
We should have a say, and we should be listened to.
We are being treated unfairly.
